REMARK 265 
REMARK 265 EXPERIMENTAL REAL SPACE FILE 
REMARK 265    P(r)-DISTRIBUTION BASED ON : DIRECT SVD 
REMARK 265  SHANNON LIMITED MOORE-PENROSE PSEUDO-INVERSE MATRIX INVERSION 
REMARK 265  COEFFICIENTS ARE THE HISTOGRAM HEIGHTS WITH EQUAL BIN WIDTHS 
REMARK 265

REMARK 265 
REMARK 265 P(R) DISTRIBUTION BINNED USING SHANNON NUMBER 
REMARK 265 R-values REPRESENT THE MID-POINT OF EACH BIN 
REMARK 265 BIN HEIGHT REPRESENTS THE VALUE OF P(R-value)
